name: Juicy Glass Lip Oil
about: What it is:¬†A lip oil that is inspired by fruits and is nonsticky, hydrating, and plumps the look of lips...Highlighted Ingredients:¬†- Vitamin Tree Fruit Oil: Nourishes, moisturizes, and helps lips feel soft and supple...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: These high-shine glass lip oils come in super sheer shades and are formulated with skin-loving, fruit-infused ingredients that nourish lips. The ultra-comfortable large applicator makes it easy to give your lips the glassy shine in just one swipe...Clinical Results: In a consumer study of 20 women:.- 100% said lips felt plumped.- 95% said lips felt more hydrated.- 95% said formula feels nonsticky and smooth
ingredients: -Vitamin Tree Fruit Oil: Nourishes, moisturizes, and helps lips feel soft and supple...Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dilinoleic Acid/Butanediol Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dextrin Palmitate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil*, Sorbitan Isostearate, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Menthol, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Dehydroacetic Acid, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Melia Azadirachta Bark Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Linalool, Limonene, Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the ultra-comfortable large applicator to swipe product onto lips.

reviews.review_text: I think as far as a lip oil goes, it‚Äôs just ‚Äúokay.‚Äù I‚Äôve come across a few that are a lot better. This one smells weird (doesn‚Äôt smell like raspberry at all) and is also quite sticky once it wears off a little bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is very hydrating and leaves a pretty shine/color. It is slightly sticky though, especially when it dries down, but realistically I think no hydrating lip oil is 100% non-sticky so I don't mind it. The shine seems to last up to an hour for me before I need to reapply, but the hydration lasts for way longer. It has a strong fruity fig scent which I love but may not be ideal for people sensitive to fragrance. Overall I think it's better than the other lip oils I've tried so far (Dior, Rare beauty, Elf, Clarins) in terms of longevity, hydration, non-stickiness, tint, and packaging.

reviews.review_text: After trying this product out for a couple of days, I would say that it depends on how much your willing to spend. I got it on sale, and I would say I'm happy with this product. Its hydrating, perfect amount of pigment, layers good with other products, and smells amazing. I took away one star because it is a bit sticky. Definitely more of a gloss-lip oil combination. Also, the smell is really strong, so if your sensitive to smell, I would pass on buying this. This size is also extremely small, unfortunately. And it only lasts about 30 minutes before reapplying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kaja's products are an absolute delight. They're fun and whimsical to look at and are unique and joyful to use. I love when a brand puts out exciting and different colors so obviously I had to try out The Juicy Glass Lip Oil in Grape Glowtini since it's purple. The packaging is super cute, I love the little details Kaja puts into their products to give a magical moment; for the Juicy Glass Lip Oil that's a heart bead in the top of the tube that reflects rainbows. The doe foot is huge and soft so I feel like I'm getting enough product every time I use it and I get full coverage on each lip with one swipe a piece. The scent is phenomenal, just like a PB&J sandwich! (And not for nothing it tastes good too.) The color itself is a very light wash, it looks like an ethereal glow. There's a touch of purple but unless you pair it over something with cool tones it's very minimal so there's a lot of room to play and mix and match for a more dramatic or subtle wash of color. It is indeed juicy, and sits almost like water on the lips, it actively feels hydrating and gentle. It's got a bit of a shorter lifespan for wear but it's a lip oil not a stick or gloss so it'll absorb throughout the day. The high gloss sticks to every curve and nook giving a 3D plumping effect. My one change I might make is that once you take the applicator out of the tube it really looks like you're getting less product because the foot takes up so much space, which is a bit of a bummer because I want to get a ton of use out of it because I'm really digging it!  All-in-all it would be worth the buy for me and I want to collect all of them. A super light and refreshing lip oil that definitely delivers and looks cute doing it. I am thankful to Kaja for gifting the Grape Glowtini Juicy Glass Lip Oil to me so that I could test it out!

Overall, I‚Äôd definitely recommend this if you‚Äôre looking for a lip oil, I might even get more colors in the future.  Packaging is also very adorable.

reviews.review_text: Kaja Juicy Glass Lip Oil is truly a unique lip product that delivers on its promises of plumping and hydrating your lips. After a short while, my lips started to look naturally plump, and the effect was impressive. It's like having fuller lips without any invasive procedures. The initial glossy finish is stunning, giving your lips a luscious shine. However, it transforms over time. As the lustrous sheen subsides, your lips gradually return to their natural shade, but the hydration remains. It is a fantastic feature as it lets you enjoy the plumped effect without feeling like you're wearing too much makeup. This lip oil is an excellent choice for plump, hydrated lips with a natural-looking gloss. I highly recommend trying it out for a fresh and radiant lip look.

reviews.review_text: I was excited to try the NEW Juicy Glass Lip Oil, I was looking into testing a lip oil for a few weeks already. I liked the idea of testing a lip oil that gives you a glossy shine and hydration. I ordered the shade Rose Hip Spritz, which is described as a sheer pink with a hint of red.  When the product arrived, I was surprised to see that the color in the bottle was more red than pink. However, when I applied the lip oil to my lips, it was much sheerer than it appeared in the bottle. It did give my lips a nice, natural flush of pink with a glossy shine, and I liked it.   The lip oil also felt really good on my lips. It was lightweight and non-sticky, and it kept my lips feeling hydrated. I didn't have any problems with my hair getting stuck on it, either. I reapplied it every 1 hour or so, but I tend to 'eat' my lipsticks and balms all the time, so it might last longer on other people.   Overall, I am really impressed with the NEW Juicy Glass Lip Oil. It gives my lips a beautiful, glossy shine and hydration, and the color is perfect for everyday wear. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a new lip oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this lip oil. It truly is and does what the product says which is something I love about this brand. I got the Grape Glowtini and it has a very mild fruity scent, no flavor! It claims to plump and I can definitely see a bit of plumpness without it being exaggerated but the best part is it doesn't tingle as other plumping glosses do. It truly does have a high shine which I love and goes well on its own or with any other lipstick. It's not sticky and leaves my lips feeling very hydrated. I noticed the gloss lasts me about 2.5 to 3 hrs without drinking or eating and after it disappears, my lips feel so soft and hydrated. The doe-foot applicator is a little chubby but it applies great to the lips and also as you are pulling out the product, it sort of hugs the applicator so you don't get excessive product out which doesn't waste it nor does it get messy around the lid. I didn't find that it had any color even though it's purple unless it's very unnoticeable. I love it just as it is. The packaging is also very cute with the little charm on the lid, it gives it a nice touch.

reviews.review_text: Finding a high-quality lip product can be challenging, but the Kaja Juicy Glass Lip Oil in Raspberry Refresher rises to the occasion. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Kaja Raspberry Refresher Juicy Glass Lip Oil, and I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase! This product has exceeded all my expectations, and I can't wait to share my thoughts. First and foremost, let's talk about the scent ‚Äì it's nothing short of amazing! The moment I twisted open the cap, I was greeted by the delightful aroma of fresh raspberries. It's like a burst of summer in a bottle. Every time I apply this lip oil, I can't help but smile as the sweet and tangy scent envelops my senses. It's not overpowering but adds a subtle, delicious note that lingers throughout the day. Now, let's discuss the shade of this lip oil. I opted for the Raspberry Refresher shade, and I must say it's a perfect choice. The color is a beautiful, sheer tint of pink that enhances my natural lip color with a hint of raspberry goodness. It gives my lips a healthy, natural-looking flush that works well for both casual and more dressed-up occasions. I appreciate how it complements my everyday makeup looks, adding that extra touch of allure. The best part, though, is how this lip oil feels on my lips. It's like a burst of hydration for my lips, instantly quenching any dryness or chapping. The texture is incredibly smooth, not sticky or greasy at all. It glides on effortlessly, providing a glossy finish that makes my lips look plump and luscious. I love how it adds a beautiful shine without feeling heavy or uncomfortable. Plus, it's so lightweight that I almost forget I'm wearing anything on my lips ‚Äì it's that comfortable! The Kaja Raspberry Refresher Juicy Glass Lip Oil has quickly become a staple in my beauty routine. I have included pictures below showing a side to side of it applied and one side not. As well as applied fully!
